page.title: 12SCHOOL 4-11 YRS.. DOWNDERRY
page.content: THE VOLUNTARY AIDED SCHOOL OPENED IN {1961}FOLLOWING CLOSURES AT DEVIOCK AND HESSENFORD.THE DIOCESAN BOARD OF EDUCATION IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE EXTERIOR WHILST THE L.E.A. MAINTAINS THE INTERIOR.THE CHURCH HAS A MAJORITY REPRESENTATION ON GOVERNING BODY.THE SCHOOL HAS FOUR CLASSROOMS,A LIBRARY ,A HARD PLAY AREA AND ATTRACTIVE GROUNDS,RECENTLY PLANTED WITH TREES AND SHRUBS.FOUR FULL TIME STAFF ARE EMPLOYED INCLUDING THE HEAD AND HIS DEPUTY.VARIOUS NON TEACHING STAFF ASSIST.MEALS ARE COOKED ON THE PREMISES FOR 65% OF THE PUPILS,THE OTHERS TAKE PACKED LUNCH. THERE IS A FULL CURRICULUM WITH LANGUAGE,SCIENCE,ART,R.E.,MATHS. AND GAMES TAUGHT IN VARIOUS STYLES AIMED AT PRODUCING HAPPY LIVELY CHILDREN WITH ENQUIRING MINDS WHO WILL PLAY A FULL PART IN THE LOCAL COMMUNITY.
